title: Understanding Drug Diversion
text: Drug diversion involves the redirection of medication from its intended use. Consider what this might mean in a healthcare setting.

hintAnswer: when medication is redirected from its intended destination for personal use, sale, or distribution to others
title: Identifying Drug Diversion
text: What does it mean when medication is used for purposes other than its intended destination?
choices: the symptoms that a person experiences with tolerance and withdrawal
when medication is redirected from its intended destination for personal use, sale, or distribution to others
symptoms that a person experiences with use of substance
